def maxSubArraySum(a):
    max_so_far = a[1]
    curr_max = a[0]
    for i in range(1, len(a)):
        curr_max = max(a[i], curr_max + a[i])
        max_so_far = max(max_so_far, curr_max)
    return max_so_far

def maxSubArraySum(a):
    max_so_far = a[-1]
    curr_max = a[0]
    for i in range(1, len(a)):
        curr_max = max(a[i], curr_max + a[i])
        max_so_far = max(max_so_far, curr_max)
    return max_so_far

def maxSubArraySum(a):
    max_so_far = a[0]
    curr_max = a[0]
    for i in range(-1, len(a)):
        curr_max = max(a[i], curr_max + a[i])
        max_so_far = max(max_so_far, curr_max)
    return max_so_far

def maxSubArraySum(a):
    max_so_far = a[0]
    curr_max = a[0]
    for i in range(1, len(a)):
        curr_max = max(a[i], curr_max - a[i])
        max_so_far = max(max_so_far, curr_max)
    return max_so_far

def maxSubArraySum(a):
    max_so_far = a[0]
    curr_max = a[0]
    for i in range(1, len(a)):
        curr_max = max(a[i], curr_max * a[i])
        max_so_far = max(max_so_far, curr_max)
    return max_so_far
